contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or in case of doubts, contact us by email

introduction.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
introduction.content: Cookies are small text files sent to your device when you visit a website. They enhance your browsing experience by remembering your actions and preferences (such as login and region selection) so that you don‚Äôt have to re-enter them each time you visit.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Cookies

thirdPartyCookies.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content:
In addition to the cookies we set ourselves, we also use third-party tools for analysis and advertising, which include:
- Google Analytics: To understand how users interact with our site.
- Facebook Pixel: For targeted advertising and engagement analysis.
- Microsoft Clarity: For user behavior and experience analysis.
- Stripe: For payment processing and transaction security.

cookieManagement.title: 4. Managing Cookies
cookieManagement.content: You have full control over the use of cookies. Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can adjust your browser settings to refuse or limit cookies. However, this may affect your experience on our site, possibly resulting in slower loading times or limiting certain functionalities.

cookiePolicy.title: 5. Cookie Policy at Just Launch
cookiePolicy.content: On each visit to our site, we will present our cookie policy, giving you the choice to accept or decline cookies. We respect your decision and provide options to manage your preferences.

policyUpdates.title: 6. Updates to Cookie Policy
policyUpdates.content: We may update this policy periodically. We recommend that you review this policy regularly to stay informed about how we are using cookies.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For questions related to these Terms, contact us at:

confirmationEmail.subject: Email Confirmation! Is it really you?
confirmationEmail.title: Confirm your email
confirmationEmail.message: For your safety, we need to verify that your email belongs to you.
confirmationEmail.warningMessage: If you have any problems, contact our team
confirmationEmail.textWarningMessageLink: by sending an email to support.
confirmationEmail.afterFooter: when you registered with Just Launch. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, contact
confirmationEmail.textFooterLink: by sending an email to Support.

userConfirmationAccount.title: Account Confirmation Required!
userConfirmationAccount.message: , we've noticed that you haven't confirmed your account yet. To ensure security and the best experience on our platform, completing this process is essential.
userConfirmationAccount.warningMessage: Click the button below to receive the email.
userConfirmationAccount.verifyMessage: Check your email now and confirm your account!
